Biden is expected to announce NO shutdowns and provide more testing kits to households. More booster shots all over USA. Expect omicron to reduce the risk of hospitalization with vaccine plus boost shots.

Expect gap up on green because of 5 days of downside. Momentum has shift upward trajectory..
